DOC.brief_summary: Various national & international body like FDA , CSP lay guideline reasonable use SWD electro therapeutic agent ( EPA ) ensure safety & effectiveness . However , remain uncertain , whether practice physiotherapist aware existence guideline implement daily practice . Any lack knowledge background endanger patient safety lead serious health hazard . In present survey , 49 physiotherapy practitioner interview self-report measure investigate knowledge base , mode application SWD ( 6 item ) & awareness recommend guideline ( 5 item ) etc .
DOC.brief_title: Practice Short Wave Diathermy ( SWD ) Application
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : cross sectional survey design use self-report form record participant 's view use . Sampling frame consist physiotherapist work private clinic sub-urban area Mumbai , Maharashtra , India . Institutional ethic committee Terna Physiotherapy College grant permission conduct survey . The self-report form cod order conceal identity therapist . In survey 49 physiotherapist interview self-report form consist total 23 item . In initial section survey form general information collect regard year experience ( 1 item ) , Types condition treat ( 1 item ) , No patient treat ( item 1 ) Duration onset ( item 1 ) & type modality use ( item 1 ) . Specific item interrogate therapist 's knowledge EMF generate modality design retrieve information dosage prescription ( 7 item ) , acquaintance recommend guideline & indication ( item 5 ) , year experience particular modality ( item1 ) , Any kind side effect observe ( item 1 ) , action take ( item 2 ) , refer personnel recommend modality ( item 1 ) , overall therapist 's experience effectiveness modality ( item1 ) .
DOC.criteria: Private physical therapist practitioner Who volunteer participate
